text: daejieneun dayanghan ttangdeul-i geunjeobhago issgo podobatgwa jeondabgwa pung seonghan jonglyeonamuwa geuleohji anhneun geos i iss-eudoe hangaji mullo jalanila hananim-eun geujung-ui ilbuleul daleun geos boda meoggie deo johdolog hayeoss-euni sillo geu an-eneun baegseong-i al-aya hal-yejeung-i issnola
